DisplayForm.Script: <UiScreen infoLevel="Normal"> <Title>>RFID Card reader</Title> <Operations> <Op type="Submit" action="./show_rfidnr"> <Label>Submit</Label> </Op> <Op type="Back" action="./"> <Label>Back</Label> </Op> </Operations> <IoScreen> <IoObject> <Title>RFID card reader </Title> <IdScanner id="RfidCardInput"> <Label>Please put RFID Card on the card reader.</Label> </IdScanner> </IoObject> </IoScreen> </UiScreen>
